TopicTitle: Tales of wonder and imagination! Your favorite KSP dream!

Articles.Content: I have just awoken from one of the best dreams ever! I had a dream that I was an astronaut with NASA and that Minmus was an actual celestial body. My crewmembers and I left our Mun station to travel to Minmus to survey the moon. We had a lander, a habitat to live in during the expedition, and space suits! Somehow we ended up in a firefight with several celebrities but that's just my imagination. At the end of my dream, we left Minmus and returned to the Mun. This is a short synopsis but it took place over an 8-hour period. That's a long KSP session. Have you had any interesting KSP dreams yourself? Tell us all!

I don't think I've had any KSP dreams, at least that I remember. I may have been doing some mental design in a quasi-sleep stage, that's usually how I get myself to fall asleep if I'm having trouble doing so. Or I read the articles my AP US Gov teacher gives us. That puts me to sleep real fast!

I've had a couple of KSP dreams which give me ideas for the next day. (Kraken Drive)

However I generally wake up when I realise I'm dreaming due to fear of the shadow figures.
